accessibility.text: A framework for recursive multi-agent systems
A framework for recursive multi-agent systems
Recursive Delegation: start with a single agent, which has a tool to delegate tasks to new child agents
A framework for recursive multi-agent systems
A framework for recursive multi-agent systems
Recursive Delegation: start with a single agent, which has a tool to delegate tasks to new child agents
When presented with a complex task, the agent can decompose it and give each part to a new child agent
Each child can complete their own sub-task if it's simple, or decompose further and delegate again
